title.value: Совершенствование конструкции газо-жидкостных эжекторов для обезжелезивания воды в линиях по производству безалкогольных напитков
Improvement of the design of gas-liquid ejectors for iron removal from water in lines for soft drinks production

journal.title: Proceedings of the National Academy of Sciences of Belarus. Agrarian Series

person.name: Grudanov, V.Ya., Belarus State Agrarian Technical Univ., Minsk (Belarus)
Sekatskaya, Yu.A., Mogilev State Univ. of Foodstuffs (Belarus)
Tkacheva, L.T., Belarus State Agrarian Technical Univ., Minsk (Belarus)

abstract.value: The article deals with the process of iron removal from water using a gas-liquid ejector of a new design. The design parameters of a multi-jet ejector are calculated. Theoretical and experimental research shows that the created gas-liquid ejector ensures efficient and equal oxygenation of water, at the same time with these design parameters of the ejector the water decontamination factor is 96.8 %. The laboratory and field tests of a trial sample of a new ejector show its high efficiency.
